search_results.title: TRY
search_results.lyrics:
TRY Lyrics[Verse 1]
I know it's a fight
To try and listen
'Cause I might not know what to say
Selfishly, I'm worried
You might run and hide
Selflessly‚ you're learning
I hold onto pride

[Chorus]
But no sacrifice
Comes without mistakes
And we could fly
Take a leap of faith‚ it's time to decide
Try‚ try, try
[Verse 2]
Out here feeling scared
But at least I'm living
Unprepared
To walk away
I won't let the same thing, no
Stop us every time
But why is it that changing‚ oh
Feels like a goodbye

[Chorus]
But no sacrifice
Comes without mistakes
We could fly
Take a leap of faith
Look inside, oh
Don't you hesitate
We should fly
Take a leap of faith, it's time to decide
Try‚ try, try

[Outro]
What is it you're waiting for?
It's time to open up your eyes and see, see, see, see
You are what you're waiting for
Just open up your eyes, it's time to see, see, see, see
What is it you're waiting for?
It's time to open up your eyes and see, see, see, see
You are what you're waiting for
Just open up your eyes it's time to see, see, see, see
(See, see, see)You might also like1Embed

Every day you’re gone
Every day I move on
‘Cause it is plain to see
That you weren’t meant for me
‘Cause I…

I ain’t got the time to lose
On you
On you, no
I ain’t got the time to lose
On you
On you, no

[Verse 2]

So why are you here begging?
Looks like you didn’t think of
Everything before letting
Me out of sight, ‘cause now you’re like
“Can I come around?”
Say you’re missin’ the sound
Of my everyday
You can stay away
‘Cause I…

On you
On you, no

On you
On you, no
I ain’t got the time to lose
On you
On you, no
I ain’t got the time to lose
On you
On you, no

search_results.title: Stay Away (From Me)
search_results.lyrics:
Stay Away (From Me) Lyrics[Verse 1]
Here I am
Back again
Underrated
And afraid
I done came
All this way for nothin’

Bittersweet
Memories
Got me dealin’
In my feelings
I admit
A bit too much
A bit too much
Been dealin’ in my feelings a bit too much
[Chorus]
So am I runnin’ in your mind
Or am I runnin’ out of time
Undefined is a reminder I ain’t done
So you can
Stay away from me
Just stay away from me

[Verse 2]
I don’t know
How to go
Unrestricted
I’m conflicted
‘Cause I came
All this way for somethin’, somethin’
See
Story goes
I must fold
But I’m stayin’
No more waitin’
Don’t mistake
My mistakes for nothin’, nothin’

[Chorus]
So am I runnin’ in your mind
Or am I runnin’ out of time
Undefined is a reminder I ain’t done
‘Cause if I’m runnin’ in your mind
Then I ain’t runnin’ out of time
Undefined is a reminder I ain’t done
So you can
Stay away from me
Just stay away from meYou might also likeEmbed

When did it begin
How do we end?
So much time consuming
Trying to pretend
That we can tell the difference
Between wrong and right
But will we mend the distance?
Between truth and lies

In this empty space (Space)
Maybe we're too soon
For this time and place (Place)

What if we're not meant to be so far apart
Do you think we'll mend the distance?
Maybe there's no difference
Maybe there's...

[Outro]
No room, no room for you and I
Maybe it's too soon, too soon to do this right
